prompt_text: At 6:00 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% and turn on all living room lights to 30%
automation_yaml:
id: 'morning_office_livingroom_lights_0600'
alias: Morning Office and Living Room Lights at 6AM
description: "At 6:00 AM every day, set the Office Wled to 50% brightness and the Living Room light to 30% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 128
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness: 77

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
